sentences.en: A sense of impending doom came upon all of us.
sentences.cn: 我们所有人都有一种大难临头的感觉。

sentences.en: Against a background of impending famine, heavy fighting took place.
sentences.cn: 即将发生饥荒之时, 严重的战乱爆发了.

sentences.en: Anxiety refers to the emotional state elicited by signals of impending punishment.
sentences.cn: 焦虑不安是指由于出现迫在眉睫的、惩罚的征兆而产生的情绪状况.

sentences.en: For weeks I have had a feeling of impending disaster.
sentences.cn: 几个星期来,我一直感到大祸即将临头.

sentences.en: From the moment Edward had told her of the escape attempt, she had been overtaken by a sense of impending doom.
sentences.cn: 自从爱德华告诉她打算逃跑的那一刻起，她便强烈感到厄运在一步步逼近。

sentences.en: Glaucus gazed upon his impending fate with unwinking eyes.
sentences.cn: 格劳科斯睁大眼睛,盯着迫在眉睫的灾难.

sentences.en: He'd spoken to Simon that morning of his impending marriage.
sentences.cn: 那个早上他已经对西蒙讲过他即将结婚的事了。

sentences.en: On the morning of the expedition I awoke with a feeling of impending disaster.
sentences.cn: 出发远征的那个早上，我醒来就有一种灾难即将来临的感觉。

sentences.en: On the morning of the expedition, I awoke with a feeling of impending disaster.
sentences.cn: 远征出发的那天早上，我醒来就有一种大难临头的感觉。

sentences.en: Rumours about an impending royal divorce were rife.
sentences.cn: 到处都是有关王室成员即将离婚的传言.

sentences.en: She could now no longer contain herself, and was convinced that some disaster was impending.
sentences.cn: 她此时按捺不住自己, 料想一定是凶多吉少.

sentences.en: The king convoke parliament to cope with the impending danger.
sentences.cn: 国王召开国会以应付迫近眉睫的危险.

sentences.en: The town itself is believed to be largely deserted after many of its inhabitants fled the impending crackdown, some of them crossing the border to nearby Turkey.
sentences.cn: 据信，许多居民逃离即将发生的镇压活动之后，这个城镇大部分已经被遗弃，其中一些人穿越边境逃往附近的土耳其。

sentences.en: There were perfectly cogent reasons why Julian Cavendish should be told of the Major's impending return.
sentences.cn: 要将少校即将返回的消息告知朱利安·卡文迪什是有绝对充足的理由的。

sentences.en: They received intelligence of an impending invasion.
sentences.cn: 他们收到消息,说侵略就在眼前.

sentences.en: War was impending over the young republic.
sentences.cn: 战争正在逼近这个年轻的共和国.

sentences.en: We were well aware of impending disaster.
sentences.cn: 我们清楚地意识到即将来临的灾难.

words.tran_cn: 即将发生的；迫切的；悬挂的

trans.tran_cn: 即将发生的，迫在眉睫的，迫切的，悬挂的
trans.tran_en: an impending event or situation, especially an unpleasant one, is going to happen very soon
